column5: Fishcrazy has the open water whitefish dialed in. Early spring is the best time on Simcoe. Summer is about donkey smallmouth bass. Check him out if you're interested. https://youtu.be/PQ8Sro8ZvIo
Been there ice fishing a couple of times. Right after a wind shift and the ice piled up.Had to jump over the crack in the ice. Caught perch.
